name: Pronets Academy Private Basketball Coaching
description: Pronets Academy offers dedicated basketball coaching in Ghatkopar East, Mumbai. With passionate and encouraging coaches, the academy focuses on skill development, sportsmanship, and competitive exposure through inter-society matches and regional tournaments.

contact.address: 57/1102, 11th Floor, Pant Nagar, Ghatkopar East, Mumbai 400075

highlights: Exposure to inter-society matches and regional tournaments
Focus on sportsmanship, discipline, and holistic player development

facilities.name: Basketball Coaching Courts
facilities.description: Indoor/indoor-adjacent courts available for private coaching sessions.
